Reference

Create Generic Report Objects

report()

Automatic report of R objects

report(<aov>)

ANOVAs Report

report(<default>)

(General) Linear Models Report

report(<lmerMod>)

Mixed Models Report

report(<stanreg>)

Bayesian Models Report

model_text(<htest>) report(<htest>)

h-test (Correlation, t-test...) Report

report(<bayesfactor_models>) report(<bayesfactor_inclusion>)

Models' Bayes factor Report

report(<character>) report(<data.frame>) report(<factor>) report(<numeric>)

Data frame Report

report_sample()

text_long() text_short() table_long() table_short()
